Responsibilities: A lucrative job opportunity in a Japanese company for female candidates. Promotion within 6 months for good performance. Training for newcomers will be provided. Starting salary from 12,500 with potential salary increase based on performance and two Eid bonuses. Age: 18-25 Responsibilities: 1. Sewing according to design for wig making 2. Operating various sewing machines such as straight stitch and cover stitch 3. Working with attention to detail and maintaining cleanliness while making wigs 4. Working efficiently to finish tasks on time 5. Following quality control rules 6. Cleaning work area after finishing tasks Qualifications: 1. Experience in operating sewing machines required 2. Experience in wig making is a plus 3. Ability to work with attention to detail and maintain cleanliness 4. Motivated to work as part of a team 5. Basic understanding of accounts and measurements Job Type Full-time Working Hours 8 hours Shift Day shift

Responsibilities: Key Responsibilities:
- Visit assigned outlets (A-category retail, supermarkets, and stores) daily to achieve sales targets.
- Build and maintain relationships with retailers and distributors.
- Ensure product visibility and availability in the market.
- Collect payments from credit sales within 2-3 days.
- Report daily sales, collections, and competitor activities to management.

Requirements:
- Previous experience in FMCG sales (especially snacks/chanachur/biscuits/tea/soft drinks) is an advantage.
- Age: 20-30 years.
- Must be hardworking, target-oriented, and self-motivated.
- Good communication skills in Bangla (basic English is a plus).
- Should live near target sales areas (Gulshan, Banani, Baridhara, Mohakhali DOHS, Badda, Rampura, Niketan).

Salary & Benefits:
- Salary (Basic, sales incentive, and others): 15,000 BDT per month.
- Sales Incentives & Bonus based on performance.
- Mobile bill and travel allowance (as per company policy).
- Weekly holiday: Friday.

Job Type
Full-time

Working Hours
8 hours

Shift
Day shift

Offer appropriate products to customers according to their needs and provide detailed information about product quality. Promptly address any issues or complaints from customers. Responsibilities: Purpose: Ensure refrigerators meet quality standards by inspecting components, monitoring production processes, and identifying defects before shipment. Key Responsibilities: - Inspect incoming materials, in-process units, and finished refrigerators.
- Perform functional, dimensional, and visual quality checks per SOP.
- Record inspection data and prepare quality reports.
- Identify and report defects, non-conformities, and process deviations.
- Ensure compliance with safety, quality, and ISO standards.
- Coordinate with production teams to resolve quality issues. Requirements: - SSC/HSC or Diploma in Engineering (preferred).
- Fresher/ 1тАУ2 yearsтАЩ experience in quality control (home appliances/manufacturing preferred).
- Knowledge of inspection tools, measuring devices, and SOPs.
- Attention to detail, communication, and teamwork skills. KPIs: - Defect rate reduction.
- On-time inspection completion.
- Compliance with quality and safety standards.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Brief Introduction Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The country consists of three neighboring islands located in the middle of the Leeward Islands - Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. Each year, millions of tourists visit the islands, and the country's economy heavily relies on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular salaries, a good working environment, and affordable cost of living for foreign workers. Field: Private villa and condominium construction Position: Electrician Number of positions: 8 Responsibilities: Installation of electrical lines on building and construction sites Installation of switches, sockets, DB boards, and light fittings Diagnosis and repair of electrical faults Adherence to safety standards Requirements: Age: 21-40 years Language: Must be able to speak and understand English fluently Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their skills in their respective field; training and experience certificates in the mentioned field must be provided. 3-5 years of practical experience in the relevant field is necessary. Candidates must be mentally calm and adaptable, and must have a clean record. Passport must be valid for at least 1 year. Benefits: Salary: USD 1,000 per month; 6 days a week Accommodation: Free; Transportation: Free Food: Self-sponsored Work Permit: Provided Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining visa Comparatively low visa processing fees Contract duration: 12 months; Renewable based on performance. Deadline for submitting files: First week of March, 2026 Delegate Interview: March, 2026

Responsibilities: Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Brief Introduction Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The country consists of three neighboring islands located in the middle of the Leeward Islands - Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. The islands attract millions of tourists each year, and the country's economy relies heavily on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular pay, a good working environment, and affordable cost of living for foreign workers. Position: Construction of private villas and condominiums Position: Plumber Number of Positions: 7 Job Responsibilities: Installation of water pipes, drainage, and sanitary lines Working on bathroom and kitchen fittings Fixing pipe leaks and blockage issues Repair work on new and old lines Requirements: Age: 21-40 years. Must be able to speak and understand English fluently. Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their skills in the relevant job; training and experience certificates in the field must be provided. 3-5 years of practical experience in the relevant job is necessary. Candidates must be mentally calm and tolerant, and must have a clean record. Passport must be valid for at least 1 year. Benefits: Salary: USD 1,000 per month; 6 days a week Accommodation: Free; Transportation: Free Food: Self-funded Work Permit: Provided Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining visa Comparatively low visa processing costs Contract Duration: 12 months; Renewable based on conditions Deadline for File Submission: First week of March, 2026 Delegate Interview: March, 2026

job_description:
Responsibilities: Skilled and experienced Shuttering Carpenter Foreman is being recruited for the renowned organization China State Middle East in Saudi Arabia. Responsibilities: Provide accurate guidance and instructions to the shuttering/formwork team. Ensure formwork setup according to project drawings and specifications. Monitor progress of work and prepare daily reports for the authorities. Manage and allocate resources (wood, plywood, steel form) on site effectively. Ensure team's safety compliance and implement risk prevention measures. Benefits: Salary: 2500 - 4000 Saudi Riyal + Food + Accommodation + OT Accommodation and Food: Provided by the company Working Hours: 10 hours per day Other Facilities: Company will provide visa and transportation Overtime: As per Saudi labor law ЁЯУМ Qualifications: (Please read the details carefully before applying for the job) ======================================== Educational Qualification: Diploma/B.Sc in Civil Engineering. Certification: Preference will be given to candidates with relevant professional certificates or training. Experience: 3 to 5 years of work experience. Candidates with GCC/foreign work experience will have an advantage. Language: Must be able to speak basic English or Arabic. ЁЯУЖ Delegate Interview: March, 2026 (Dhaka) Additional Information: Visa Contract Duration: 2 years - Renewable Passport: All applicants must bring both new and old passports to the interview. Passport must have a minimum validity of 1.5 years. Applicants without passports should not apply. Payment Terms: Payment will be made after obtaining the visa.

Responsibilities: Summary: Pubali Bank PLC is hiring skilled and proactive individuals for the expansion of Pi Banking services. Target and Salary: Minimum of 60 merchant accounts If the target is achieved, the monthly salary will be рз│16,000. Special Benefits: Incentive/commission based on target achievement Possibility of permanent employment based on good performance. Note: No financial transactions are involved in the position of QR Executive Officer.
